sentences.english: It's the plural for heaven, so the heavens or the heavenly places is this Greek word.
sentences.chinese: 这里用的是复数，天国和神圣之地是同一个希腊词。

sentences.english: And as it is in the floral tribe, so it is in God's kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界如此，在天国也是如此。

sentences.english: Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 虚心的人有福了，因为天国是他们的。

sentences.english: As the writer states, we are being treated as heirs or sons of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正如作者所述，我们被接纳为天国的儿女和后嗣。

sentences.english: The Bible says that heaven is a perfect place.
sentences.chinese: 圣经上说，天国是一个完美的地方。

sentences.english: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣对门徒说，我实在告诉你们，财主进天国是难的。

sentences.english: You can enter God's Kingdom only through the narrow gate.
sentences.chinese: 只有通过那扇狭窄的门，你才可以到达天国。

sentences.english: This thesis reviews the background of tax barriers and customs of the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 本文考察了太平天国税关与海关的设立背景。

sentences.english: Does to rags the heavens tear.
He taught that before creation God made of list of who would go to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他教导创世之前，神已列出谁将进入天国的名单。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is important for the research of the Taiping Heavenly Kindom to research waterborne forces of Hunan Army.
sentences.chinese: 考察湘军水师于是成为研究太平天国史的重要课题。

sentences.english: We know that the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom Church of God and prayer are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道，太平天国与拜上帝教息息相关。

sentences.english: All the members of the Holy Christian Church will be in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 圣而公之教会的所有成员将会进天国。

sentences.english: Therefore, the kingdom of heaven is like a king who wanted to settle accounts with his servants.
sentences.chinese: 天国好像一个王，要和他仆人算账。

sentences.english: Your kingdom is glorious and your generosity everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你的天国辉煌灿烂，你的慷慨无处不在。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
to rest/to go to sleep/to rest in peace/(history) Parthia
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
